text:
I wonder if this is related to 
https://www.windowscentral.com/software-apps/windows-11/microsoft-unveils-the-windows-app-for-accessing-windows-pcs-in-the-cloud-from-any-device
 
“Microsoft is announcing a new "Windows app" for iOS and iPadOS, the web, and
Windows today that enables the ability to connect to any of your remote Windows
PCs no matter where you are.” 
…which sounds a lot like Remote Desktop. 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.
%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Remote Desktop in CPL?
